books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the strange death of Gen. George S. Patton in December 1945.
books.name: KILLING PATTON

books.author: by Lena Dunham
books.description: A collection of revealing and often humorous personal essays from the creator and star of “Girls.”
books.name: NOT THAT KIND OF GIRL

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Jim Gaffigan
books.description: The comedian, author of “Dad Is Fat,” describes his relationship with his subject.
books.name: FOOD

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Richard Preston
books.description: The discovery of the Ebola virus, and the efforts to keep it from spreading; first published in 1994.
books.name: THE HOT ZONE

books.author: by Cary Elwes with Joe Layden
books.description: The making of the movie “The Princess Bride,” 25 years ago.
books.name: AS YOU WISH

books.author: by Neil Patrick Harris with David Javerbaum
books.description: The actor’s life story is structured as a Choose Your Own Adventure book.
books.name: NEIL PATRICK HARRIS: CHOOSE YOUR OWN AUTOBIOGRAPHY

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: Studies of the people who created computers and the Internet, beginning in the 1840s.
books.name: THE INNOVATORS

books.author: by Andrew Burstein and Nancy Isenberg
books.description: A dual biography of the third and fourth presidents; first published in 2010.
books.name: MADISON AND JEFFERSON

books.author: by Michael Savage
books.description: The radio host urges true patriots to save the country from the machinations of the left.
books.name: STOP THE COMING CIVIL WAR

books.author: by Jay Sekulow with Jordan Sekulow and others
books.description: An examination of the jihadist group and a warning about its dangers.
books.name: RISE OF ISIS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Steven Johnson
books.description: A history of innovation focused on the development of six key technologies of modern life; the companion volume to a PBS series.
books.name: HOW WE GOT TO NOW
